import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useAuthContext } from "../hooks/useAuthContext"; import { useLogout } from "../hooks/userLogout"; const Header = () => { const { user } = useAuthContext(); const { logout } = useLogout(); const [showDropdown, setShowDropdown] = useState(false); const [showMobileMenu, setShowMobileMenu] = useState(false); const toggleDropdown = () => setShowDropdown(!showDropdown); const toggleMobileMenu = () => setShowMobileMenu(!showMobileMenu); const [showDepositModal, setShowDepositModal] = useState(false); const [depositAmount, setDepositAmount] = useState(""); const platformCharge = 0.02; const walletData = { investment: "₹12,500", profile: "₹3,200", wallet: "₹9,300", }; return (
{/* Logo */}
{/* Desktop Nav */}
what is xpo why xpo xpo indexes from index managers blog team contact
{/* Auth Buttons or Profile */}
{!user ? ( <> Sign up Sign in ) : (
{showDropdown && (

My profile

Name: {user?.name}

Email: {user?.email}

{user?.PhoneNumber && (

Phone: {user.PhoneNumber}

)}

Wallet Overview

Investment: {walletData.investment}

Profile Balance: {walletData.profile}

Wallet: {walletData.wallet}

{/* */}
)}
)} {/* Mobile Menu Toggle */}
{/* Mobile Nav */} {showMobileMenu && (
what is xpo why xpo xpo indexes from index managers blog team contact {!user ? ( <> Sign up Sign in ) : ( )}
)} {showDepositModal && (

Deposit to Wallet

setDepositAmount(e.target.value)} className="w-full px-3 py-2 border rounded mb-4 text-black" placeholder="e.g. 1000" />

Platform Charges (2%): ₹ {(depositAmount * platformCharge).toFixed(2)}

Net Credit: ₹ {(depositAmount - depositAmount * platformCharge).toFixed(2)}

)}{" "}
); }; export default Header;
